text: Sorry, I put a filter on column K (status). I categorised them into Active (maintainer responsive and okay to continue), Presumed active (maintainer did not respond but contributed in 2021 or 2022), Maintainer needed (current maintainer responded to say this or did not respond and there has been no recent contribution), or Inactive (no response and no translation). Ukrainian, Greek and Dutch fall in the last category - there are no .po files for these languages in any of the base or recommended packages, so we may as well drop them from the table.

text: I have not check translations for the Windows installer though - where can I find these?
